1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey and Chandler are there as Phoebe enters carrying a drum.

lines.Line:
Hey! Wow, it is true what they say, pregnant bellies look like
a drum

(not amused) Ha-ha. (She sits down on the couch.) No, it’s just
I’m so pregnant that I—my guitar doesn’t fit anymore. So I thought
‘til I’m not, I’m just gonna play all my songs on this drum. It sounds really
cool

Listen. Listen. (She starts to play and sing.) <i>Smelly cat, smelly
cat, what are they feeding you? </i
I know! I know, and I’ve only been playing for like an hour
Hey! What are you doing here
Umm, actually, I came down to ask you a big favour

Oh, well, don’t tell me you want to keep more of your stuff in my
uterus

(laughs) No. No. No. (Sits down.) Okay, now, see, I wanna name the girl
baby Leslie, and Frank wants to name one of the boy babies Frank JR. JR.
Wouldn’t that be Frank the III
Wouldn’t that be Frank the III
Wouldn’t that be Frank the III

Don’t get me started. (To Phoebe) Anyway, umm, since there are three
babies and umm, we both got to put our names in, we would be truly honoured if you named
the other boy baby
Wow! That’s so great! Oh! Oh! Cougar
Wow! That’s so great! Oh! Oh! Cougar

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, Joey and Chandler are playing
foosball as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: Hey! Do we have a baby name yet

Ugh! No! This is so hard! I went through this whole book (Holds up a
book) and found nothing! I want a name that’s really like, y’know strong and
confident, y’know? Like-like Exxon.
Well, it certainly worked for that Valdez kid
Well, it certainly worked for that Valdez kid
Ooh-ooh, Pheebs, you want a strong name? How about, The Hulk

No, I’m-I’m not sure about Hulk, but I like the idea of a name
starting with "The.

Oh, want a good name, go with Joey. Joey’s your pal. Joey’s your
buddy. "Where is everybody?" "Well, they’re hanging out with
Joey.

Hey, y’know what, if you’re gonna do that, if you’re
gonna name him Joey, you should name him Chandler. (Phoebe doesn’t think so.) Oh,
come on! Chandler’s funny, sophisticated, and he’s very loveable, once you get
to know him

Oh well, hey, Joey’s loveable too! But the thing about Joey is, if
you need him, he’ll be there

Well, Chandler will be there for you too. I mean, well, he might be a
little late, but-but, he’ll be there. And he’ll bring you some cold soda, if
want you need him for is that you’re really hot
What do ya say? What do ya say
What do ya say? What do ya say
What do ya say? What do ya say
What do ya say? What do ya say

Well, I, I like the idea of naming him after someone I love, and Joey
and Chandler are great names. (They both stare at her.) But, all right, I
don’t—maybe I’ll just name him The Hulk

I knew I shouldn’t have mentioned it! That’s what I wanted to
name my kid

3.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's erm, Chandler and Joey's, Joey, Chandler, and Phoebe are
there as Ross enters.

lines.Line: So uh, Emily called last night
And now you’re giving me the message

Turns out them Emily is just crazy about Susan. Yeah, they’re
going to the theatre together! They’re going to dinner! They’re going horseback
riding

Look, this is just a little too familiar, okay? For like, for like six
months before Carol and I spilt up, all I heard was: "My friend Susan is so smart. My
friend Susan is so funny. My friend Susan is so great.
You actually think that something can happen between Emily and Susan
Hey, they’re going to the gym together! Two women! Stretching! Y’know they-they take a steam together! Things get a little playful—didn’t you see Personal Best
Hi! Hi! You’re crazy! Okay? This is Emily. Emily is straight

How do you know? I mean we thought Carol was straight before I married
her
Yeah, I definitely. I don’t like the name Ross
Yeah, I definitely. I don’t like the name Ross
What a weird way to kick me when I’m down
No! No! I-I meant for the baby
No! No! I-I meant for the baby

Well, it’s just y’know that something like this would never to
like The Hulk, y’know
Actually that-that’s not true, in The Incredible Hulk uh, No. 72, Dr. Bruce Banner found… (Sees everyone staring at him and stops.) Y’know, ugh, nevermind, my girlfriend’s a lesbian. (Leaves.

So, I decided I’m definitely going to go with either Joey or
Chandler

Oh! Oh-oh, you gotta pick Joey! I mean, name one famous person named
Chandler

Oh! Oh-oh, you gotta pick Joey! I mean, name one famous person named
Chandler

Okay, there are no famous Joey’s. Except for, huh, Joey
Buttafucco
Yeah, that guy really hurt us
Yeah, that guy really hurt us

Well, how about a compromise then, okay? What if it’s like
y’know, Chanoey

Okay, look, Joey! Come on, think about it, first of all, he’ll
never be President. There’s never gonna be a President Joey

All right look man, I didn’t want to bring this up, but Chandler, is
the stupidest name I ever heard in my life! It’s not even a name; it’s barely
even a word. Okay? It’s kinda like chandelier, but it’s not! All right?
It’s a stupid, stupid non-name
Wow, you’re, you’re right. I have a horrible, horrible name
Wow, you’re, you’re right. I have a horrible, horrible name

I’m sorry man, I didn’t—I’m-I’m sorry. I’m
sorry. (Goes over and comforts him.)
So I guess it’s Joey then

4.SceneDescription: Ross’s apartment, Carol has come to pick up Ben.

lines.Line:
Well, I asked him if he wanted to eat, he said, "No." I asked
him if he wanted to sleep, he said, "No." I asked him what he wanted to do, he
said, "No." So, he’s sweeping. (We see Ben playing with a broom and a
dustpan.
So umm, any word from Susan
Ooh, yeah! She said she’s having sooo much fun with Emily

Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Uh, by the by, did it uh, did it ever occur to you that, I
don’t know, maybe they might be having a little too much fun
Y’know, the kind of fun, you and Susan had when we were married
Oh my God, you are so paranoid!
Oh my God, you are so paranoid!

I can’t speak for Emily, but Susan is in a loving, committed
relationship

Uh-huh, Carol, so were we. All right, just-just imagine for a moment,
Susan meets someone and-and they really hit it off. Y’know? Say-say they’re
coming back from the theatre, and they-they stop at a pub for a couple of drinks,
they’re laughing, y’know, someone innocently touches someone else…
There’s electricity, it’s new. It’s exciting. Are you telling me there
isn’t even the slightest possibility of something happening
OH MY GOD!! I didn’t really believe it until you just said it!

5.SceneDescription: Joshua’s parents’ apartment, continued from earlier.

lines.Line:
Ohh! It’s so nice to meet you. (She goes over and shakes their
hands.) Hello.
Hello. Well, Joshua, that $500 was for groceries

What? This-this, no, oh no, no-no-no, this is not—that’s-that’s not what it is. See, see, okay, I work in fashion, see and-and, this is a real dress actually. It’s-it’s, they’re-they’re wearing it in Milan, so part of my job is too wear the clothes, and then I see how people respond, and then I report back to my superiors at Bloomingdale’s, so… And obviously in uh, in-in this case, (She grabs a pen and paper) I am going to report back, "USA not ready.
So, have you kids eaten yet
Well, we were going to do that after—I mean umm, next

Well, we’re starving, why don’t we all go get something to
eat

Oh, yeah, well… Yeah, no use wasting this baby, just lyin’
around the house.

You’ll wear that. We’ll be eating, and of course,
you’ll be wearing that

6.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Rachel is telling Phoebe and Monica of her date.

lines.Line: So, you wore your nightie to dinner

Oh, yeah. And uh, the best part though, when the uh, waiter spilled
water down my back, I jumped up, and my boob popped out

No, it’s all right. I got nice boobs. (Phoebe and Monica nod there
heads in agreement.

(returning from the phone.) So, I just picked up a message from Emily, she
and Susan are going to a poetry reading together!
So! Poetry? Susan’s gay! They’re being gay together
Wow, Carol really messed you up

Yeah, she turned you into this-this-this untrusting, crazy, jealous,
sycophant. (They all look at her.) All right, so I don’t know what sycophant means,
but the rest is right

Look, I don’t know what you’re talking about, I am not a crazy,
jealous person

She’s totally right! When we were together, you got all freaked out
about Mark and there was nothing going on

Oh, sure it does! In high school, you weren’t jealous at all even
though all your girlfriends were cheating on you

All right, all right, so up until ‘92-93 he was very trusting, then
’94 hit, Carol left him and bamn! Paranoid city

Look, all we’re trying to say is, don’t let what happened with
Carol ruin what you got with Emily
Well, I still think I was right about that whole Mark thing

What—yeah—what, y’know what? I hope Emily is a
lesbian

7.SceneDescription:
The Airport, Carol and Ross are waiting for Emily and Susan to deplane. A
gorgeous woman walks by and they both turn to watch her go.

lines.Character: (They both run and hug they’re respective partners
lines.Line: They both run and hug they’re respective partners.
(To Emily) Thanks for everything, I had such a great time

lines.Character: (They hug and give each other a little peck on the cheek
lines.Line: They hug and give each other a little peck on the cheek.
(To Carol) No tongue. (And gives her the thumbs up.
